channel.title: Cs:go
channel.description:
Who got it and how do you like it so far?
I preordered like a week ago, just getting to play it now. Surprised there wasn't a thread about this already.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=edYCtaNueQY[/youtube]

item.title: Cs:go
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just going to bump this thread a little bit, anyone still playing this?

I’ve stopped playing matchmaking as of the past 3/4 months and went full time into league and 5v5 team scrims on the daily. My team are fast moving through the rankings and have picked up our first few sponsors (http://pkrhosting.co.uk and http://perixx.com). We recently just played Planetkey Dynamics and clanMystik as well so we’re slowly climbing to the sort of tier 3 level of play which is pretty awesome.

If anyone’s struggling with the game or is in need of any tips hints tricks and demo reviews, hit me up. It’d be pretty cool to help you guys out.

http://i.imgur.com/m8HwmMR.jpg - PkD Screenshot, I’ll get the clanMystik one when my teammate comes online.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’m disappointed tbh! Was playing the 45min trial you get for free on the sexbox360.
Same gameplay as the other cs s but just modernised, maybe cause its on the xbox it just doesn’t feel on par with css to me.
Its still good, worth buying for the price but yeah:(.

Cs1.6 was the first cs and that came out in either 1999, 2000 or 2001 btw.

You don’t start at 1.6.

item.title: Cs:go
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Did you ever think of compatibility? The source engine has pretty much been completely redone since CSS, it makes hl mods less compatible with CSS as it gets older. CSGO was a good way to prep counter strike for dual supporting mods for hl3.

And again, it was only a small change (+ alot of new maps) for $15. They could be like call of duty and charge you $60.

Read full topic

item.title: Cs:go
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:32, topic:455404”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=558303.msg4097297#msg4097297 date=1347000837]

Same shit all over again. Just as I expected.

What? Don’t act like this is call of duty. The game has been around since what, 2004? The game needed a serious makeover in order for modders to continue to have interest in it. And they also tried to make it more like 1.6.

And its only $15.

I have bought it, but it’s still the same shit all over again. The only thing I care about in games is the gameplay and storyline if there is one. Not the graphics. And on CS:GO the gameplay is still the same.

Also, why do you have to make a reference to call of duty each time someone says something about game being recycled?
[/quote]
You’re screwing yourself if you only care about storylines[/quote]

The only thing I care about in games is the [b]gameplay[u] and[/u] storyline if there is one[/b].
A good example of what I like is Metal Gear Solid, it also has good graphics, but that's just a bonus. Gameplay > Storyline > Graphics. Can you see what I meant now?

Read full topic

Also, why do you have to make a reference to call of duty each time someone says something about game being recycled?[/quote]

Because…

en.wikipedia.org

Call of Duty

Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise. The series began on Microsoft Windows, and later expanded to consoles and handhelds. Several spin-off games have been released. The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II, but later games like Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare are set in modern times or in futuristic settings. The most recent game, Call of Duty: WWII, was released on November 3, 2017. An upcoming title, Call of Duty: Black Ops 4, is in development an...

1 Main series 1.1 Original trilogy 1.1.1 Call of Duty 1.1.2 Call of Duty 2 1.1.3 Call of Duty 3 1.2 Modern Warfare series 1.2.1 Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare 1.2.2 Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 1.2.3 Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 1.3 Black Ops series 1.3.1 Call of Duty: World at War 1.3.2 Call of Duty: Black Ops 1.3.3 Call of Duty: Black Ops II 1.4 Upcoming 2 Canceled Call of Duty titles 2.1 Call of Duty: Devil's Brigade 3 Expansions 3.1 Call of Duty: United Offensive 4 Console and handheld (video) games 4.1 Call of Duty: Finest Hour 4.2 Call of Duty 2: Big Red One 4.3 Call of Duty: Roads to Victory 4.4 Call of Duty: World at War: Final Fronts 4.5 Call of Duty: Modern Warfare: Mobilized 4.6 Call of Duty: World at War: Zombies 1 and 2 4.7 Call of Duty: The War Collection 4.8 Call of Duty: Black Ops Declassified
